variable.name: clinic
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. De-identified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: fsasdate
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. De-identified date form completed

variable.name: mask_pat
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. De-identified patient ID

variable.name: nbb1
variable.description: B1. Arrangement for patient transfer or move. De-identified reason for clinic transfer
variable.value: Patient wishes to attend another EDIC clinic near his home
Patient will make visits to another clinic temporarily
Patient wishes to attend another EDIC clinic near his home

variable.name: nbb2dat
variable.description: B2. Arrangement for patient transfer or move. De-identified date medical records will send to new clinic

variable.name: nbb3adat
variable.description: B3a. Arrangement for patient transfer or move. De-identified date first visit-new treatment center

variable.name: nbb3b
variable.description: B3b. Arrangement for patient transfer or move. On which EDIC follow-up year will the patient first visit the new follow-up center?

variable.name: nbb3cdat
variable.description: B3c. Arrangement for patient transfer or move. De-identified temporary move: date patients which stop visits, move to the new follow-up center

variable.name: nbb4
variable.description: B4. Arrangement for patient transfer or move. De-identified clinic to which patient will transfer
